p: Pasting characteristics of the porridge from the composite flours were determined using a Rapid Visco Analyzer (Perten Instruments AB, Kungens Kurva, Sweden) according to the methods described by reference [ 28]. Peak viscosity, trough, breakdown, final viscosity, setback, peak time and pasting temperatures were read from the pasting profile with the aid of thermocline for Windows software connected to a computer [ 29]. The viscosity was expressed in centipoises (cP).
